attributes.action: Scrap the need for compulsary purchase of annuities at age 75.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scrap the need for compulsary purchase of annuities at age 75 which allows the insurance companies to take your hard earned pension fund, payback you only the equivalent of the interest if it were invested in a high street bank and then keep the capital sum on your death.
The sums for this are skewed so that the insurance companies never lose out and you never win. And that's legal?
